model.name: views
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW JoinTestView ( RowId integer, SUPPLIER_ID string, PART_ID string, QUANTITY bigdecimal, SHIPPER_ID bigdecimal, SHIPPER_NAME string, PRIMARY KEY(RowId) ) AS SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.SUPPLIER_ID), A.SUPPLIER_ID, A.PART_ID, A.QUANTITY, A.SHIPPER_ID, B.SHIPPER_NAME FROM SUPPLIER_PARTS AS A INNER JOIN SHIP_VIA AS B ON A.SHIPPER_ID = B.SHIPPER_ID;

model.name: PartsOracle
PartsSqlServer
